org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class NcbiGeneInfoParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.NcbiGeneInfoParser

  • public class NcbiGeneInfoParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse NCBI Entrez gene_info file and return data structure for each row for later processing.

      • NcbiGeneInfoParser

        public NcbiGeneInfoParser(java.io.Reader reader,
                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> taxonIds)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Construct the parser with the file to read, the input file can be for a single taxon or for multiple.
        Parameters:
        taxonIds - set of taxon identifiers
        reader - a reader for the gene_info file to be parsed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problems reading file

    • Method Detail

      • getGeneInfoRecords

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<GeneInfoRecord>> getGeneInfoRecords()
        Return information read from the file, for each taxon id there is one GeneInfoRecord per row in the file.
        Returns:
        a map from taxon id to gene information records

      • isUniquelyMappedEnsemblId

        public boolean isUniquelyMappedEnsemblId(java.lang.String taxonId,
                                java.lang.String ensemblId)
        Return true if the given Ensembl identifier is assigned to only one gene for the taxon specified.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - the taxon of the gene being looked up
        ensemblId - an ensembl gene identifier
        Returns:
        true if this ensembl id is only mapped to one NCBI gene

        Return true if the given symbol is is assigned to only one gene for the taxon specified.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - the taxon of the gene being looked up
        symbol - a gene symbl to check
        Returns:
        true if this true id is only assigned to one NCBI gene
